column4: jzapples: i think you have to first go to evolution and export then it should give you like a file thing that when you go to thunderbird and go to import you search on that file that represents your mail history in evolution
by export, do you mean select all the email messages and goto File > Save as mbox...?
i wish, i must have had evolution configured wrong the first time i got them off my hotmail account and it removed them all after it imported
yup it was a major bummer at the time
